AttackedJaheiraAllies.synopsis: Jaheira has seen you attack her allies (specifically general allies like Harpers or her animal friends - Minsc/her family have specific reactions) and gradually loses patience with you.
AttackedJaheiraAllies.how_to_trigger: - Attack harpers in Act 2/3- Attack the animals in Jaheira's Basement

PaperAcquired.synopsis: VB for Jaheira commenting on the first Baldur's Mouth paper you can find
PaperAcquired.how_to_trigger: - Find any Baldur's Mouth seller- Get a paper

PAD_AttackedAlly.synopsis: Jaheira has seen you attack her allies (specifically general allies like Harpers or her animal friends - Minsc/her family have specific reactions) and gradually loses patience with you. This is the AD variant incase she can't get you in conversation.
PAD_AttackedAlly.how_to_trigger: - Attack harpers in Act 2/3- Attack the animals in Jaheira's Basement

AttackedJaheiraAllies_0.speaker: Jaheira
AttackedJaheiraAllies_0.text: You forced me to raise arms against my own. That will not happen again.
AttackedJaheiraAllies_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Using for Jaheira/Minsc attacking her allies. Hence vaguenessNodeContext: Irritated, saw us attacking a friend of hers.

AttackedJaheiraAllies_5.speaker: Jaheira
AttackedJaheiraAllies_5.text: What was this - some trick of the tadpole, to make me attack my own? I won't stay here to be your plaything.

AttackedJaheiraAllies_3.speaker: Minsc
AttackedJaheiraAllies_3.text: Where Jaheira goes, so follows Boo. And so follows Minsc. Farewell, my friend.

AttackedJaheiraAllies_6.speaker: Jaheira
AttackedJaheiraAllies_6.text: Would you like to keep those hands to yourself? We have few enough allies - do not harm them.
AttackedJaheiraAllies_6.context: NodeContext: Irritated, saw us attacking a friend of hers.

AttackedJaheiraAllies_7.speaker: Jaheira
AttackedJaheiraAllies_7.text: I am not in the habit of giving second warnings. We still have a common enemy in the Absolute - but here our paths diverge. May you find good fortune - and some sense, too.

PaperAcquired_0.speaker: Jaheira
PaperAcquired_0.text: Nothing like a little panic to sell papers. I know I've bought enough of them in my time.

PAD_AttackedAlly_0.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_AttackedAlly_0.text: Whatever tadpole trickery you have employed - you will not do it again.

PAD_AttackedAlly_1.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_AttackedAlly_1.text: Careful who it is you turn your ire on. I will not stand by while you attack allies.

PAD_AttackedAlly_2.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_AttackedAlly_2.text: Some twisting of the tadpole to have me turn my blades against my own? No more - you are no better than these cultists.

PAD_AttackedAlly_3.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_AttackedAlly_3.text: I made myself clear - and I am not in the habit of offering second chances. Our paths part here - I only hope one of us has the means to finish this fight.
